Subdivision.DrivingDirections: Take exit 33 from Westbound I-84, Left on Midland Blvd, Left on Adams Ridge Drive, Right on Longtail, Left on Sunset Ridge Ave. or Take Laster Ln from Middleton Rd, thennorth on Santa Ana to Long Tail Drive, Righton Sunset Ridge Ave.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
At Adams Ridge, you'll discover affordable single-family homes with functional open floorplans that fit your lifestyle. Adams Ridge is the perfect location for your family. Located only 25 Minutes outside Boise, just off of I-84 Karcher Exit. Close to shopping, dining, and entertainment, and the Desert Spring Elementary School, Sage Valley Middle School, and Ridgevue High School. You can choose from a variety of one and two-story homes with timeless open-concept designs.
Your dream home awaits:
Take a virtual stroll through ourSpruceandAshtonmodel homes at Adams Ridge, and discover unmatched elegance and comfort!

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: Head North on Emmett Highway 16, left on W. Beacon Light Rd. Right on W Greendale St.
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Homeowners at Greendale Grove can enjoy a break from the fast pace of everyday life and take a breather in this community, located in beautiful Star, Idaho. Appreciate the charm of living in a small town, with the convenience of bustling Eagle, Idaho only minutes down the road. Hop on your bike, enjoy a peaceful stroll, or maybe even grab your golf clubs as you're just around the corner from one of Idaho's most enjoyable public golf courses, River Birch Golf Course. At Greendale Grove, you will find thoughtfully designed one and two-story floorplans with modern features. Look no further than Greendale Grove!

Welcome to Canyons at Prescott Ridge, part of our Prescott Ridge community in North Meridian. Our one and two-story single-family homes, ranging from 1,528 to 2,289 square feet, offer a comfortable and stylish living experience in this fast-growing area. Find your perfect home in Canyons at Prescott Ridge, where modern living meets the convenience of Meridian living.
At Prescott Ridge, You'll enjoy convenient access to shopping and dining, and popular city parks including Eagle Island State Park as well asthe sought-after West Ada school district. From a pond to a dog park and children's playground, Prescott Ridge will have something for everyone!

Subdivision.DrivingDirections: From I-84 W Take exit42, SlightRightto merge ontoS Ten Mile Rd, LeftontoW Cherry Ln, RightontoS Black Cat Rd, LeftontoW Gondola Dr, ContinueN Rustic Oak Way, Left on W Ladle Rapids St
Subdivision.SubDescription:
Discover Ridgelines at Prescott Ridge, an exceptional section within our Prescott Ridge community, offering slightly larger homes starting at 2,044 square feet. Nestled in the heart of North Meridian's flourishing landscape, Ridgelines brings a new level of spacious and stylish living to the neighborhood. With thoughtful design and modern amenities, these homes provide the perfect blend of comfort and functionality.
At Prescott Ridge, You'll enjoy convenient access to shopping and dining, and popular city parks including Eagle Island State Park as well asthe sought-after West Ada school district. From a pond to a dog park and children's playground, Prescott Ridge will have something for everyone!

SubVideoTour.Title: Tour of Ridgelines at Prescott Ridge

Plan.Description: Introducing the Belmont, a 2,044-square-foot single-story home where every aspect is meticulously crafted to enhance your lifestyle. The heart of this home is the open kitchen, complete with a delightful breakfast nook and a central island that invites you to embark on culinary adventures. Flowing seamlessly from the kitchen is the expansive great room. With 9-foot ceilings that soar overhead, this inviting space creates an atmosphere of openness and warmth, ideal for relaxation and entertainment. Nestled away for privacy, the primary suite features a spacious bedroom, a private bath, and a roomy walk-in closet. Imagine the possibilities of creating your own personal haven by connecting the primary suite to the fourth bedroom through the walk-in closet. Whether you envision a cozy nursery, a secluded home office, or a tranquil yoga studio, the options are limitless, allowing you to customize your living space to match your lifestyle perfectly.Every Hubble Home includes a Builder Warranty and is HERS® and Energy Star® Certified, providing substantial annual energy savings!

Plan.Description: Step into the Glendale, a 2,400-square-foot two-story home designed for modern living. On the main level, the bright and open kitchen overlooks the spacious great room and dining nook, creating a seamless flow for entertaining and everyday living. Adjacent to the great room, a dedicated playroom offers a space for children to enjoy playtime and keep toys out of sight. Convenience is key, with a drop zone featuring a mud bench located off the garage is perfect for storing outdoor gear and keeping the home organized. A half bath on this level adds practicality for guests.Upstairs, the primary suite provides a serene escape with a private bath and a large walk-in closet featuring built-in luggage storage. Two additional bedrooms and another full bathroom offer plenty of space for family members or guests, while a pocket office and laundry room add practicality to everyday routines. The upper-level loft adds versatility, serving as a relaxing retreat or customizable space. It can easily be transformed into an optional fourth bedroom or extended to the primary suite.Every Hubble Home includes a Builder Warranty and is HERS® and Energy Star® Certified, providing substantial annual energy savings!

Plan.Description: Welcome to the Mesa, a spacious two-story home spanning 2,640 square feet. Step inside to discover a bright and open great room that offers versatility, with the option to extend through the tandem bay for added space and functionality. Explore unique features like the kids' hideaway under the stairs, providing a playful retreat for little ones, and the front flex room, which can be transformed into a home office or an additional bedroom to accommodate guests. The kitchen is a chef's delight, complete with a walk-in pantry that can be converted into a morning kitchen. Upstairs, unwind in the loft area, perfect for relaxation or entertainment. The tucked-away primary suite boasts a private bath and a spacious walk-in closet with built-in luggage storage for organization and ease. Two additional bedrooms on the upper level provide ample space for family members or guests, ensuring comfort and privacy for everyone.Every Hubble Home includes a Builder Warranty and is HERS® and Energy Star® Certified, providing substantial annual energy savings!

Plan.Description: Welcome to the Sedona, where modern elegance and functionality blend seamlessly in this expansive 2,828-square-foot two-story home. The main level's practicality and style converge with a drop zone featuring a mud bench off the garage, ensuring a clutter-free entryway. Adjacent, the laundry room simplifies household chores. The open kitchen overlooks the inviting dining nook and spacious great room, creating the perfect setting for gatherings and everyday living. The pantry can be transformed into a morning kitchen. The primary bedroom is on the main level, featuring a private bath and dual walk-in closets for ample storage and luxury. Unleash your creativity in the workspace tucked under the stairs, offering a quiet retreat for productivity. The front flex room can be converted into an office to suit your needs. A half bathroom completes the main level, adding practicality and convenience.Upstairs, three additional bedrooms provide comfortable retreats for family members or guests, while a loft area offers extra living space for relaxation or entertainment.Every Hubble Home includes a Builder Warranty and is HERS® and Energy Star® Certified, providing substantial annual energy savings!
